routes.documentation: Make Statement Credit Offer Available Redeemable

responses.label: This resource returns information about the activated offer.
This resource returns offers that are available to the user and conform to the search criteria (if specified).
This resource returns extended information for the requested offer, typically used to display a detail view.
This resource returns offers that have been fulfilled by the user.

routes.documentation: Returns Information About Redeemable Postpaid Credit Offer

responses.label: This resource returns extended information about the specified activated postpaid credit offer.
This resource returns the user rating of the specified offer.
This resource returns the accumulated and potential savings for a Personalized Offers user.
This resource returns the user session token (UserToken), which is a required input to all other API resources.
